sourcesContent:
import { 
    Container, 
    Box, 
    Button, 
    Modal, 
    ModalContent, 
    ModalHeader, 
    ModalFooter, 
    Select, 
    ModalBody, 
    Input, 
    FormControl, 
    FormLabel,
    } from '@chakra-ui/react';

const EditShiftModal = (props) => {

    <Modal isOpen={props.isOpen} onClose={props.onClose} isCentered={true}>
                    <ModalContent>
                        <ModalHeader>{props.header}</ModalHeader>
                        <ModalBody>
                            <FormControl>
                                <FormLabel>Student</FormLabel>
                                    <Select placeholder='Select student' onChange={(e) => props.setStudent(e.target.value)}>
                                        {props.employees.map((item) => {
                                            return (
                                                <option key={item.id} value={item.id}>{item.name}</option>
                                            )
                                        })}
                                    </Select>
                            </FormControl>
                            <FormControl>
                                <FormLabel>Date</FormLabel>
                                    <Input type='date' onChange={(e) => props.setDate(e.target.value)} value={props.date}/>
                            </FormControl>
                            <FormControl>
                                <FormLabel>Start Time</FormLabel>
                                    <Input type='time' value={props.startTime} onChange={(e) => props.setStartTime(e.target.value)} />
                            </FormControl>
                            <FormControl>
                                <FormLabel>End Time</FormLabel>
                                    <Input type='time' value={props.endTime} onChange={(e) => props.setEndTime(e.target.value)} />
                            </FormControl>
                        
                        </ModalBody>
                        <ModalFooter>
                            {props.delete && <Button onClick={pro-pdeleteShift} color='red'>Delete</Button>}
                            <Button 
                                onClick={() => {
                                    props.setIsOpen(false);
                                    props.resetInputs();
                                }} 
                                color='red'>Cancel</Button>

                            <Button onClick={props.onClose}>Submit</Button>
                        </ModalFooter>
                    </ModalContent>
                </Modal>



}

export default EditShiftModal
